forecastday.title: Sunday

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening. Fog developing overnight. Low 6C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to considerable cloudiness and fog after midnight. Low 42F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds early, otherwise mostly sunny. High 14C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 58F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear in the evening. Increasing clouds with showers after midnight. Low 8C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
